Summary: I was walking then notice a red flaming ball hovering. IT starts to move right to left and then hovered more. No noise then takes off quickly and then disappeared.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Harlingen
There were no other sightings in Harlingen on or around January 26th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking on a trail with other people around. I notice a red flaming light hovering. I thought maybe it was a helicopter but it made no noise. This was the second time i've seen it. It started moving left to right and up and down. People around me started seeing it as well. Then it quickly moved away to the left and moving upward. It moved very fast and then disappeared. Just yesterday it reappeared again. Doing the samething but i was driving. People around me stopped and started to look at this star looking thing. It had the same look and shape as before. No clouds in the area which made it very clear. It then started moving and then disappeared again. Many witness saw it. It was cool when you see it u just know it wasn't a helicopter or airplane. IT was something unknown for me.
